context.p: How to turn on your device:

step.cmd: Before you turn on your device, check if the device is connected properly to another audio device.
Plug the power adapter into a power outlet.
Put the CD into the player with the cover side facing you.

context.p: How to set the standard language:

step.cmd: When you press the sub-title button for the first time, it will display the current language mode.
Press the button again to switch to a language you prefer.

context.p: How to switch to USB mode:

step.cmd: Press the MODE button on the remote control or the MODE button on the device.

info.note: The device will now automatically read the files from the USB drive.

context.p: How to go to the system set up menu:

step.cmd: Press SET button.

context.p: How to randomly play songs:

step.cmd: Press the PROG button to randomly assign 20 songs and play it in order.

info.note: If inactive, the operation will turn off.

context.p: How to edit a picture:

step.cmd: Press the Direction button to choose a file, zoom, or rotate a picture.

context.p: How to switch video output system:

step.cmd: Press the System Button to change the video output system to your preference.

context.p: How to fastforward and rewind music:

step.cmd: Press the FWD button to fast forward music.
Press the REW button to rewind music.

info.note: There will be no sound during this period.

context.p: How to change the channel:

step.cmd: Press the left and right channel button to change to your preferred channel.

info.note: Use the Audio button to change the language.

context.p: How to choose files or enter another part of the device:

step.cmd: Press the OK button.

context.p: How to display main menu:

step.cmd: Pres the MENU button to display the main menu.
Use the Direction Button to choose file.

context.p: How to go back to the main menu:

step.cmd: While the disc is playing, press the RETURN button to go back to the main menu.

info.note: The RETURN button does not work while playing MP3, CA and VCD1.1 disc.

context.p: How to pause and play music:

step.cmd: Press the PAUSE button to stop.
Press the button again to play again.

context.p: How to skip files:

step.cmd: Pres the NEXT button to skip the next file.
Press the PREV button skip the previous file.

info.note: If the music has stopped playing, the Prev/Next button cannot be used.

context.p: How to adjust audio on your device:

step.cmd: Press VOL+ to turn volume up.
Press VOL- to turn volume down.

info.note: The volume is not adjustable when playing a DVD.

context.p: How to turn off sound output:

step.cmd: Press the MUTE button to close the sound output.
Press the MUTE button again to open the sound output.

context.p: How to enable Sleep mode on your device:

step.cmd: Press the SLEEP button to enable Sleep Mode, the LCD screen on the device will turn off.
Press the SLEEP button again to turn on screen.

context.p: How to repeat music:

step.cmd: Press the LOOP button once to repeat current chapter.
Press the LOOP button again to repeat current folder.
Press the LOOP button for a third time to repeat the whole disc.
Press the LOOP button for a fourth time to end the cycle.

context.p: How to get to the FM Mode:

step.cmd: Press the MODE button on the remote control or the MODE button on the device to switch to FM Mode when the device is on.
Press the LEFT/RIGHT button to search the video channel.

context.p: How to switch to Bluetooth Mode:

step.cmd: Press the MODE button to switch to Bluetooth Mode when the device is on.
Press the SLEEP button again to turn on screen.

context.p: How to play MP3 files:

step.cmd: When using the device to play MP3 files, the MUTE, VOL+/VOL-, PLAY/PAUSE, and PREV/NEXT buttons have the same functions when playing a normal disc.

context.p: How to play a disc containing a AVI or XVID file:

step.cmd: Press the UP/DOWN button to find the desired file you want to play.
Press the OK or PLAY/PAUSE button to play the selected file.
Press the STOP/RETURN button to stop playing the file and return to the option interface.

info.note: When you put a disc containing a AVI or XVID file into the device, it will automatically enter the option interface.

context.p: How to access system interface:

step.cmd: Press UP/Down button to choose to find specified settings.
Press OK button to confirm settings.

context.p: How to operate On Timer Button:

step.cmd: Press On Timer button when device is on.
Play original alarm clock time after reset.
press the ON icon on LCD screen to cancel On Timer.

context.p: How to operate Off Timer Button:

step.cmd: Press Off Timer button when device is on.
Play original alarm clock time after reset.
press the ON icon on LCD screen to cancel Off Timer.

context.p: How to operate Mode Button:

step.cmd: Press Mode button on remote control to select disc, USB, or FM mode.

context.p: How to operate A-B Button:

step.cmd: Press A-B button on remote control to choose start point.
Press A-B button again on remote control to choose end point.
